text: Hagi Zedekai'ma kinima manino egeno 9nima hia kafufina, 10ni ikamofona 10ni zupa, Babiloni kini ne' Nebukatnesa'a ana maka sondia vahe'a zamavareno Jerusalemi kumara eme hahuzmanteku e'ne. Anama hute'za Jerusalemi ran kuma'mofo megi'a kuma eme ante'za mani'ne'za, kuma keginamofo tva'ontera oti'ne'za ha'ma hanaza zana mopa kate'za ante hihi hu'za mareri'naze.
